keywords: Writ of certiorari and mandamus, Prison Gaud, Applied for the post of community correction officer as an internal candidate, Appointed to the post, 5 year satisfactory service period required, it was revealed subsequently that the Petitioner was subject to disciplinary reprimand a miner punishment, Appointment was cancelled by the PSC, Released for the previous post, Placed at the first step of salary scale, appealed to the PSC and where from the AAT, Dismissed, This Writ application the CA, Legitimate expectation, Basic ingredient, Necessary for the four mention are lacking, Findings of the PSC was also challenged are ouster in clause Article 61A , Would not be a bar to invoked writ jurisdiction against a decision make without legal authority, Jurisdiction of the PSC was not challenged, Dismissed.
legistation: Clause 24:2:1 of Chapter XLVIII of the Establishment Court. Articles 58(1), 61A and B of the Constitution.
